K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-6: thugs rdo rje las byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-7: dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-8: ye shes sems dpa' snying gar bsgom; ;'od ni cher 'bar drag po'i gzi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-9: shes bya'i sgrib las rnam par rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-10: de yi thugs kar mtshan ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-11: sa bon rtag par dmigs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-12: las kyi sgrib pa rnam dag rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-13: las kyi las rnams sgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-15: ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-16: des ni mi shes bag chags rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-17: blo ldan blo la 'jog mi shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa kun dmigs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-20: spyi bor rang gi rigs bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-21: rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-22: de ltar de la brtson chen bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-23: 'dis ni rgyal rnams mnyes gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-24: myur du rgyal ba nyid thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-25: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-26: lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-27: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-28: dge byed ras ris bkra shis kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:242b-29: sdig pa'i dri ma rnams bsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-2: gtsang byed bram ze las rnyed dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-3: rgyal po 'am bu mo bzang gi ras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-5: 'dod pa bzhin du bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-6: rams sam mig sman khu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-7: sman gsum me tog gnyis ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-8: khu ba shing sbyin gsum sbyar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-9: gzhan yang sna tshogs tshon gyis bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-10: de las khro bo'i rgyal po mi g-yo ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-12: g-yon sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang 'brel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-15: nyi ma dang; tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng na g-yon brkyang bas 'gying zhing bskal pa'i me'i nang na khro bo du ma'i tshogs 'phro ba bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-16: lha'i dbang phyug mi g-yo mgon po ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhal g-yas dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-18: zhal re re spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-19: skra ser po gyen du brdzes ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-20: phyag g-yas gsum na ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-23: g-yon gsum na sdigs mdzub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-26: klus brgyan cing thod pa'i do shal can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-28: glang po che'i stod g-yogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-29: thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243a-30: rus pas brgyan cing padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-0: nyi ma'i steng na g-yon brkyang zhing g-yas bskum pa'i tshul @243b gyis 'gying ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-1: bskal pa'i me'i gzi mdangs kyi nang nas khro bo bcu 'phro ba bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-2: lha min rgyal po mi g-yo ba ni zhal bzhi re re la 'ang spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-3: phyag bzhi'i g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-5: g-yon gnyis na sdigs mdzub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-7: stod la mi'i pags pa gyon zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-11: bskal pa'i me 'bar zhing khro bo'i tshogs kyi sprin du ma 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-12: padma la zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-13: skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-14: bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i mi g-yo ba ni gtum po zhal gcig phyag gnyis ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-17: ser po gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-18: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-19: do shal dang; yan lag thams cad brgyan cing stag gi sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-20: sbrul dkar pos se ral khar thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-21: bskal pa'i tshogs kyi me 'bar ba'i nang na khro bo du ma 'khrug cing padma dang; nyi ma la pus mo g-yas pa 'thab stangs kyi tshul du bzhugs pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-22: yang na g-yon pa gshed po'i tshul du btsugs shing lhag ma nam mkha' la 'greng zhing bteg pa bri 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-23: gang yang rang 'dod pa zhig de ltar bris nas de'i mdun du rang nyid kyi 'dra 'bag tshon sna tshogs kyis bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:243b-24: ri mo mkhan la go ba legs par bskyed nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-1: phul nas bkra shis brjod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-2: rang gi gnas kyi dben pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa mngon sum du mi g-yo bar bsgrubs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-3: me tog la sogs pas legs par mchod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-4: ye shes kyi khro bo'i rgyal po 'ang de nyid la bstim par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-5: gang yang dngos grub 'dod pas spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-9: gos la sogs pas rgyun du mchod na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'grub pa la gdon mi za'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-10: 'dir skye bo 'ga' ni dman pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-11: skur pa 'debs na shin tu yang lhung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sku dben pa'i sa phyogs su sba bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-12: zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-13: ral gri la sogs brgyad rnams dang; ;mchog gi sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-14: rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan las rnyed 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-15: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-16: bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-17: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-18: gsang ba rnam par dag byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-19: dngos grub myur phyir gsang sngags rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-20: rim pa dbye ba ngo mtshar nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-21: bcu bzhi'i dbyangs las yum gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-22: gsal byed gnyis pa'i dang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244a-23: gsum pa'i lnga pas nye bar brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-0: gsum pa'i gsum pa der @244b bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-1: lnga pa'i lnga pa brgyad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-2: dbyangs kyi gnyis pas mdzes par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-3: me dang dbyangs bcu gsum par 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-4: drod gnyis pa dang drag mtha' 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-5: sum cu gsum dang dbyangs drug 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-6: nyi shu rtsa lnga pas brgyan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-7: nyi shu gnyis dang bcu gcig 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-8: de la nyi zlas rnam brgyan pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-9: gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-10: stong khri 'bum mam bye ba bcu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-11: sa ya bzlas kyang lha mthong 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-12: snying po sdig bral dga' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-13: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-14: sdug bsngal zad byed bde ba che; ;sgrub pa rnams la skyed byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-15: gsang sngags drag po dran byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-17: sangs rgyas 'gyur ro gzhan ci smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-18: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva dh'a ba shuddhonyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-19: gzung ba dag pa ye shes kyi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-20: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-21: 'dzin pa'i sems dag pa ye shes kyi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-22: aom badzra shuddh'a: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho nyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-23: sku brten pa rdo rje ye shes kyi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-24: aom k'a ya b'a ktsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-25: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-26: aom aa tsa la te dza badzra pushpe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-31: sa pa ri w'a re bhya: dza: h'um bam ho: santi pat'a sarba satv'a n'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:244b-32: ai mam ba lim gri hna kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi bhaksha bhaksha ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-3: s'a lu dkar dang til dkar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-4: gro dang nas dang bra bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-5: shing tog la sogs rtag par mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-6: aom tsande mah'a ro sha na h'um mandal ma dhe a'a gatstsha dza ya sa ma ya stam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-8: aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na ma ma sha trum aa mu kam sya sha r'i ram k'i la ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-9: ka ti mu ta stambha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-10: hri de k'i la ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-12: phur bu gdab pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-13: na ma: sa manta k'a ya b'aktsi tta badzr'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-14: aom aa tsa la k'a ma ka na tsanda mah'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um tr'am mam ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-15: las la bskul ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-16: na ma: sa manta k'a ya b'aktsitta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-18: aom aa tsa la k'a natsanda ta na ta na matta matta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-24: a'a be sha ya a'a be sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-25: ma h'a mantra bha la ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-37: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-39: tri pa lingta ram ga na rakta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-43: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-45: aa manti ka kro dha ma h'a ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245a-51: badzra n'a ma t'am aa pra ti h'a te bhya: dz'a l'a ya tr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-0: las thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i @245b sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-1: na ma: sa manta k'a ya b'aktsi tta badzra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-2: aom tra tra aa mo gha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-5: tra m'a ya tra m'a ya h'um tra ta ham mam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-6: aom ba lim ta te dzo m'a li ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-7: cho ga thams cad rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-8: na ma: sa ma nta k'a ya b'aktsi tta badzra nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-11: a'a pra ti ha te me ae hye hi aa tsa la wa te dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-32: ae hye hi mah'a ka ru na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-39: sarba tra aa nutta re ki tsa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-43: 'di ni srung ba dam pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-44: khro bo'i rgyal po mi g-yo ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-45: gang gis gsang sngags rnams shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-46: yi ge tsam gyis bdud brlag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-47: mang du brjod na smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-48: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-49: gsang sngags rnams 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-50: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-51: gsang sngags grub pa las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-52: las kyi sbyor ba'i dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:245b-54: bsam gtan rnam dag chos rnam dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-2: rang 'byung rnam dag don rnam dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-3: bya ba rnam dag byed pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-4: sgyu ma sgyu ma'i ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-5: sgyu 'phrul lta bu'i 'khrul 'khor dang; ;mig yor smig rgyu'i gzugs brnyan 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-6: sna tshogs chu bur bzhin g-yo ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-7: gang gis bdud las rgyal byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-8: yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub par bya; ;rgyal gyi skar mar btsugs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-9: thod pa dkar po dri chus bra na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-10: 'di ni las rnams kun bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-11: dus su srung zhing bskyed bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-12: dus su mchod dang gtor ma byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-13: bar chad kun las rnam rgyal yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-15: spra tshil la sbrul nag po'i gzugs byas nas gu gul tshil chen gyis bdug cing sngags drag tu brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-16: gang 'dod pa'i lus la byabs nas khrus byas te rtsva ku sha'i chun pos 'og nas g-yug cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-17: n'a ga r'a dza sa ma ya dunti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-18: phu ta phu ta phat ces brjod na gang la klu gnod pa de sos par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-19: yang na gong du bstan pa'i yungs kar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-20: gu gul gyis bdug cing sngags drag tu brjod na klu 'bros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246a-22: 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin pa la yungs kar bskyed pa la sngags mang du bzlas nas gtor na 'byer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-0: byis pa gsar du btsas pa srung ba ni kham phor rdo rgyus kyis @246b bris pa bcang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-1: spra tshil gyi gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas pa'i snying gar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bcug la kha la tsher ma btsugs na bsgrub bya'i kha la tsher ma btsugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-2: rkang pa la btsugs na rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-3: snying la btsugs na dran pa stor bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-4: mi'i rje ngar gyi rus pa'i phur bu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-5: lcags phur yan lag gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-6: gang la btab pa de zha ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-8: dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan mang du sngags nas dgra bo'i sgo 'og tu btab na 'byer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-9: g-yul du zhugs nas ral gri la bsngags te bzung na rgyal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-10: gang la'ang gtor ma'i bye brag gis 'grub nges so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-11: dur khrod du phyin te snod thod pa la pad snal dkar po'i sdong bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-12: tshil chen gyi mar me byas la tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-13: bcu bzhi la sbar ba'i du ba mig la byugs na gzhan gyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-15: zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-16: mi g-yo mgon po'i sku kham pa la byas nas me tog shel pa li ka 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-17: dantot pa las mchod cing sngags mtshan thog thag bzlas pas tshe lo stong [?] bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-18: yang zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe dum bu drug pa'i thod par khrag sna tshogs blugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:246b-19: mandal nag po'i thog tu bzhag nas kha me long gis bcad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-1: steng du kham pa las byas pa'i mi g-yo ba bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-2: rang nyid gcer bu'i lus ma he'i rnam lngas byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-3: mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-4: yang nyi ma zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe mandal gru bzhi pa byas nas grva bzhir ral gri btsugs la rang nyid gcer bu lus thams cad thal bas byugs te mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-5: gal te gter kha dbye bar 'dod pas mi g-yo mgon po'i sku kham pa las byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-6: sman drug la sogs pa dri zhim po thams cad dang lhan cig pa'i rin po che'i snod kha sbyar du bcug nas mandal dkar po'i dbus su khri'u la bzhag nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-7: dus gsum du mchod cing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gsol ba gtab cing aa ka ru la sogs pa'i spos sreg cing bstod pa byas na zla ba gsum gyi rjes su gter rnyed nges so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247a-8: gal te char 'bebs par 'dod na klu yod pa'i gnas su klu'i dkyil 'khor byas te sbra tshil lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-0: bag zan la dga' bo la sogs pa'i gzugs byas te; kha dog tha dad par byas nas mandal der bzhugs te dam tshig ba bskyed nas dbus su mi g-yo mgon po dang bcas pa la ye shes kyi lha bcug @247b nas; ka ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-3: 'o ma la sogs pas mchod cing rtsa ba'i sngags 'brug ltar bsgrags pas klu rnams skrag nas char pa'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do; ;gal te mi 'bab na thod pa dum bu gcig par klu'i gzugs rnams bcug la gdug pa can gyi mes bsres na char shing rta'i phang lo tsam zhag bdun du 'bengs pa la the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-4: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-5: sbyor ka phra mo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-6: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-7: bsam gtan brtan las byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-8: 'khrul med nyid de gnod rnams sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-9: khams gsum rgyal po cher nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-10: spro bsdu'i rim pa goms gyur las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-11: ji srid 'dod kyi dus bar du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-12: rang sems gnas nas brtan par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-13: dngos med dngos sogs ma lus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-14: rnam rtog rab rib kun bsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-15: nyon mongs nad rnams ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-16: bag chags dang bcas gtan bcom nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-17: 'phral du yang ni brod ka skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-18: spro yang mi dmigs bsdu mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-21: gnas na ye shes myur du thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-22: bla med ye shes yon tan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-23: mthu rnams che bar 'gyur ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:247b-24: bla ma mnyes las rnyed 'gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-2: gus pas rtag par nyin mtshan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-3: rgyun chad med par goms byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-4: myur du phyag rgya chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-5: dngos grub snod du 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-6: 'bad rtsol byang chub yan lag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-7: le lo gnyid dang g-yeng ba spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-8: sngags gsal dmigs pa brtan gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-10: skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-11: gro ga'am yang na shin shun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-12: gur gum gi wang tsandan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-13: rdo rje rgya gram mu khyud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-14: dbus su ming dang sngags spel bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-15: mu khyud la ni rtsa sngags bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-16: rva kun la ni h'um dang ming //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-17: spel te g-yas nas bskor la bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-18: dkyil 'khor dkar po'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-19: me tog dkar po'i steng gzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-20: lha yi skur ni bskyed byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-21: stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-23: lus la bcangs na srung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-24: kham phor sar pa la rdo rgyus kyis bris te sgor bcangs na gsar du btsas pa'i byis pa srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248a-25: dur khrod kyi ras la sngags ming dang bcas pa bris te sbra tshil gyis gtums nas dur khrod kyi bum par bcug nas kha rdo rje rgya gram gyis bcad de sbas na mngal skems par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-0: phyung nas 'o mas @248b bgrus na sos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-1: gal te bsad par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por byas pa'i steng du kham pa las byas pa'i mi g-yo mgon po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-2: g-yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-4: thod khrag g-yon na 'chang pa byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-5: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-6: de nas dri ma drug dang bag zan las bsgrub bya'i gzugs sor brgyad byas nas rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo gsad pa'i sham bu dang bcas pa snying gar bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-7: de'i sku'i zhabs su bzhag nas rang nyid lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas zur bzhir mi rus sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-9: lcags las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi pa bzhag pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-10: thun mtshams thams cad du btab par shes pa brgyal bar bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-11: de'i 'od kyis mdun gyi phur pa mi g-yo bar bsgoms pa'i thugs bskul nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-12: de las khro bo lcags kyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-13: zhags pa thogs pa grangs med pa spros pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-14: bsgrub bya rlung gi 'khor lo la bzhag nas 'ongs pas skad cig tsam gyis phung po gtor nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-15: shes pa ling ga la bstim par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-16: de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byas pas hom khung du bsreg pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:248b-17: mnan pa byas na dbang phyug chen po yang gsod par nges na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-2: nya'i khrag gis 'khor lo ral gri rtse mo ltar rno bar byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-3: lte ba'i dbus su gru gsum ma'i nang du bsgrub bya'i ming dang rgyud du bcas pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-4: de zhags pas bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-5: rtsibs rnams su sngags kyi rkang pa brgyad pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-6: mu khyud la ming dang bcas pa'i snying po bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-7: de'i rgyab kyi mu khyud la las thams cad pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-8: mu khyud gsum pa la rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-9: ral gri spel nas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-10: de nas thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-11: zhing skras bcings te; bsgrub bya dag za ba'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas khro bo shin tu khros pas khrag 'dren pa'i lta bas bltas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gang la byas pa de khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-12: dur khrod du sbas na mtshon gyi bskal pa babs nas 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-13: shing gcig gi rtsar sbas na rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-15: lam rgya gram du sbas na smyo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-16: lha rten zhabs su sbas na zha bor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-17: klu yod pa'i sar sbas na mdzes zin pa la the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-18: rang nyid kyi nyal ba'i zhabs su sbas na 'dod ba'i bu mo khugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-19: ci sta rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na dmag kyang rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249a-20: de dag thams cad la khro bo 'bar ba dud pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa phyag bzhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-1: spyan gsum dang ldan par blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-2: dur khrod kyi ras la dmag dpon gyi ming dang spel ba'i sngags rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte bar bris la mtha' yi ge lam brgyad kyis mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-3: de'i phyi rol tu dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rgya gram bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-4: de spra tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying gar bcug nas gang 'thab pa'i mtshams su bzhag na dmag rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-5: gzhan yang gza' skar la bltas te 'phyar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-8: 'ug ba'i khrag gis gong du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-9: au tstsha ta ya spel bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-11: ser ba bcad par 'dod na gro ga la gur gum mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-12: gi wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa byas la mu khyud gsum pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-13: rtsibs bzhi la snying po'i sngags yi ge h'um la bskor ba bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-14: dbus kyi lte bar yi ge ksh'im bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-15: de la rtsa ba'i sngags g-yon bskor du bris nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-16: mu khyud dang po la las thams cad pa'i sngags bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-17: gnyis pa la ral gri'i phreng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-18: gsum pa la kun tu me ri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:249b-19: de ltar dmigs te mchod nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na char ches pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-0: yang gsad par 'dod pas kham pa'i spar bu la mi g-yo ba'i snying po mtshal gyis g-yon skor du bris nas dkyil @250a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-1: 'khor gru gsum gyi nang du gong du bstan pa'i ling ka'i snying gar ming dang bcas pa bcug nas gan rgyal du steng du kha gzar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-2: las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas shing zhag bcu drug tu las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-3: de nas dur khrod kyis las byas pa'i mchod rten khru gang pa nag po'i bum pa'i nang du rang gis srung ba nyid bcug nas; mchod rten bang rim gsum man chad stong pa'i nang du tshva tshva lnga bzhag pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-4: gru gsum kha bkab cing lho phyogs su bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-5: des zla ba gnyis na 'chi nges so; ;gal te gzhan gyi rig sngags gcad par 'dod na dbang chen gyi dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po bris te zur thams cad rdo rje rgya gram gyis mchan par byas nas; grva thams cad lam gyis mtshan pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-6: rdo rje phur pas bsgrub bya'i ling ga'i steng du mnan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-7: zhag bdun gyis rigs sngags 'chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-8: yang na h'um bzhi mgo sprad pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-9: da ni tsu tsun dha ra'i lpags pa la 'khrul 'khor rengs pa'i sbyor ba dang bcas pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-10: spu la sdong bu byas shing tshil la mar me byas nas du ba de bzhar nas mig la bskus na dgras mi mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250a-11: yang dpral bar thig le bya ste lag pa la bskus na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur nges so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-0: rkang pa la bskus @250b na dpag tshad brgyar 'gro nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-1: s'a lu'i phye ma la gzugs byas te phye ma des bskus na dgra rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-2: dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bcas pas dgra bo'i sgo 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-3: dpung la gtor na nad kyi thebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-4: tsu tsun dha ra'i lpags pa la 'khrul 'khor bris nas dbugs kyis brgyangs te sngags stong bzlas na dgra de sbos nas 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-8: mah'a ga na pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-9: aom ga ga na aa dhi pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-10: aom ga na pa ti pradzny'a pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-11: na mastu ti mah'a ga na pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-12: aom ka ra ka ra ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-15: bi d'a ra bi d'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-18: da dha ba da dha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-23: dh'a pa ya dh'a pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-24: dha ya n+ya dh'a ya n+ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-26: sa ma sa ma sa ma m'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-28: ma pu tra pa tsa na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-29: aom ku ru ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-30: aom tu ru tu ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-31: aom su ru su ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-32: aom mu ru mu ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-33: aom sh'anti pushtim ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-34: aom ga ta bri dhu kri bi ta tsitta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-35: ma h'a bi dha ra gam gas tstshinti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:250b-44: aom: ga: ga: ga: ga: ga: ga: ga: ga: aom na mo na ma: sv'h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-0: tshogs kyi bdag po'i sbyor ba las rlung bcing @251a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-4: yung ba ser pos rgyal po'i ris la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi steng du ri rab rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-6: lam rim pa bzhin du bkod nas de'i dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po byi ba la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-7: kha dog gser btso ma lta bu phyag bzhi pa; g-yas dang po na bgrang phreng /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-9: 'og ma gnyis kyis thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-10: sna nam mkha' la phyar nas blta ba bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-11: de'i snying gar zla gam ljang gu'i steng du lam yam lam bris la rnal 'byor pa dbang chen yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rlung bcing ba'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-12: yang thog gam shing gi rtse mo la bzhag na rlung bcing bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-13: da ni tshogs kyi bdag po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-14: sna tshogs las grub 'di bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-15: rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-16: dbang chen nyis brtsegs dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-17: zhal gcig phyag bzhi rtse gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-18: bhi ti p'a la bgrang phreng dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-19: aa sho ki na bzung byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-20: byi ba'i steng na sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-21: skyil krung gis bzhugs khros nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-22: sngon po rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251a-23: bsams la la du la phug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-0: 'o @251b ma zho dang sprang dkar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-1: mar dang chan dang sran ma sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-2: btsos pa'i sha dang shing thog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-3: dus dang dus su mchod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-4: gter rnams 'di yis ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-5: yang na bdag nyid mi g-yo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-6: zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-7: ral gri mda' dang rdo rje g-yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-8: zhags pa gzhu dang mdung thung g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-9: khams gsum gang ba'i h'um las bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-10: sna tshogs mdog can khro bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-11: du ma mtshon cha rnams bzung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-12: rang las spro zhing bsdu byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-13: mdun du tshogs kyi bdag po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-14: zhal gcig phyag gnyis padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-15: bzhengs te mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-16: bskyed nas btsos pa'i shas mchod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-17: bsnyen pa stong byas las rnams 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-18: yul gyi tsha dang sa gsum la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-19: tshogs bdag de yi gzugs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-20: gnod pa'i ming dang ldan bcug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-21: lo nyes mi ngas phyug ngas sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-22: gang gi mtshan nas bzung ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-23: gnod pa kun las sdung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-24: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-26: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-27: las rnams grub pa'i yan lag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-28: gces par gyur pa ni sbyin sreg go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-29: tshal ni gnyis te rtsub ngos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:251b-30: yid 'ong rang gi khyim du sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-2: skyon dang bral bas thab brtsig bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-3: rgyar sor tshad ni nyi shu bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-4: de yi ngos la sor bcu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-5: dpangs ni de yi rgya las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-6: sor bzhi chung bar bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-7: padma'i dbyibs can rgyan bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-8: ral gri 'bar ba dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-9: zur bzhir rdo rje phyed pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-10: thab khung kha la rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-11: phreng ba gsal por bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-13: yang na khru gang nang khru gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-14: rim gsum sum gnyis sor tshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-15: nang du rdo rje rgya gram bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-16: gsad pa la ni sngags pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-18: zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-19: pa la sha dang pi shing sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-20: me tog dkar po yod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-21: dkar gsum mngar gyis bsres pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-22: zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-23: s'a lu nas dang gro dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-24: rgya rtsi che dang na gu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-25: sardza gu gul gur gum bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-26: tsam pa zho gar nye'u shing; ;me tog gser mdog la sogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-27: rgyas ba'i las la shin tu shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-28: tsandan dmar dang gur gum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-29: bra bo til dang rgya sran dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-30: khre dang cung rtse spel ba dang; ;ba ser mo yi bdud rtsi lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-31: na ga khro dang tsandan dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-32: me tog dmar po dbang la shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252a-33: gsad la khrag dang dug yungs kar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-0: tsha gsum ling kar bcas @252b pa'o; ;gos dkar rgyan yang dkar po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-1: yo byad kun yang dkar byas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-2: bsam pa bzang pos shar bltas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-4: rgyan gos yo byad kun ser zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-5: rgyas pa'i yid byas byang du bltas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-6: dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-8: rgyan dang gos dang yo byad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-9: kha dog dmar zhing snum gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-10: myos pa'i yid lta bus bltas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-11: dbang gi las rnams 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-12: rgyan gos gnag cing yo byad gnag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-13: rtsub pa'i yid bltas khros pa'i skad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-14: 'byin cing lho yi phyogs su bltas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-15: drag po'i las rnams myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-16: de la las byed pa'i dus su mi rus la byas pa'i phur pa mi [?] g-yo [?] bar bsgoms la; sngon du bsnyen pa song bas dang pos kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-19: bzhi bas dpus mo rnams su dam par gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-22: bag zan la ling ka byas la ske tsha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-24: nya'i rdog gzhob rnams brdungs la khrag dang sbyar nas gro ga la rdo rje rgya gram bris pa'i dkyil du ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-25: sngags spel te bris pa'i snying gar bcug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-26: aom tsanda mh'a ro sha na aa mu ka sya stam bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:252b-27: k'i la ya h'um phat ces gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-0: bsgrub bya'i shes pa rlung gi steng du bzhag la dbugs dang bcas pa drang @253a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-1: ngo; ;gal te gso bar 'dod na phur bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-2: ming bton te 'o ma blug cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-3: aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na che ge mo sh'antim ku ru ku rbantu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-4: zhes brjod na zhag bdun nas sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-5: yang gsod pa'i las bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-6: h'um las skyes pa'i mi g-yo ba long ba zhes bya ba shin tu dmar ba'i mig gcig yod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-9: ba dog ljang nag rtsu ba cing 'khrug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-10: rin po che'i brag phug tu gnas pa la dus rtag par rgyun du mchod nas gru gsum thams cad kyi dbus su bsams te sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-12: dug dang gzugs brnyan rnams zhal du bsregs na myur du 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-13: rengs par 'dod pas rnga mo'i rus pa la dze ta ya dze ta ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad du sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-14: lkugs par 'dod na ra'i sha la bha ti ra bha ta ri zhes khri tsho gsum sreg go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-15: smyo bar 'dod na khyi sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-17: dug sna tshogs pa la autmando nmanga zhes stong rtsa brgyad sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-18: dgra bo'i mig long bar 'dod pas skyer pa'i shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-19: bong bu'i rtug ba la aa ta ka ra zhes stong rtsa brgyad du sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-20: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253a-21: rnga mo'i rus pa la mo ha ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad bsregs na rmongs par byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-0: tsandan la dzva ra da pa na ya zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na yams @253b 'chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-2: khyi nag po'i sha la tsi ti dzva la ma pa na ya stong bsregs na mdze 'chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-5: dha du ra la su tri tshin dam zhes stong rtsa brgyad bsrags na mngal bskams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-6: gtum po drag po'i nga rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-7: dur ba'am gi wang ngam lan tshva 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-8: rgya skyegs bsregs na yams nad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-10: zho dang ku mu da dang sbrang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-11: bya rgod klad pa khva yi tshil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-12: 'di rnams bsregs na smyo nad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-13: lgang dang bu mi thon pa sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-15: gzhan yang sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-17: brtan pa chen po'i ye shes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-18: 'ga' las myur du thob byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-19: g-yo 'dod sred la bla ma slu; ;tshig la sems shing don mi tshol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-20: bag med g-yeng dang ser sna dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-21: brkam chen snying rje med pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-22: bskal pa brgya dang stong phrag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-23: bsgrubs kyang nam yang mi 'grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-24: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-25: ngal ba las ni gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-26: bza' btung zhim po sna tshogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-27: rtag par nyin re dus gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-28: grogs po kun la byin pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-29: lan gcig bla ma'i mchod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:253b-30: brgya yi char yang mi phod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-0: de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa @254a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-1: lha'i bu drug khris khro bo chen po mi g-yo ba la bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-3: rtse ba'i sems mnga' 'on kyang 'khrugs 'dra zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-4: dga' zhing shin tu dag kyang ra ri sna tshogs spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-5: lha yi khams rnams kun la ral gri phyar ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-6: lha min tshogs kun brgyal zhing rab tu skrag par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-7: srid pa'i nyon mongs kun la bsdigs pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-8: bdud rnams brgyal zhing skrag nas skad phyung thag ring 'bros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-9: yi ge phyed pa aa he'i ku cos log pa'i [?] phyogs skrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-10: che ba yi ni shin tu che gyur sku mnga' khyod kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis shin tu bsngags shing bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-12: klu rnams kun 'dus pas ni cha shas lus kyis phyogs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-13: lha dbang bu mo rnams kyis rin chen sna tshogs rgyan rab gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-14: spyan bgrad ljags 'dril stag lpags 'dzin pa khyod la bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-15: bstod pa chen po des bstod nas tshangs pa chen po la sogs lha tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-16: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-17: sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254a-18: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254b-0: dngos @254b grub thams cad yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254b-1: pandi ta aa tu la da sa badzra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-009:254b-2: bod kyi lo tstsha ba mar pa bande chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o //
